duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain an Access Request system utilizing Saviynt.
Build and maintain connectors to a wide variety of endpoints in Saviynt.
Build out documentation around processes configured in Saviynt and other tools.
Resolve identity-related issues across the organization.
Contribute to strategic roadmaps for IAM systems and programs.
Conduct regular or emergency maintenance or software upgrades as required.
Support dev/engineering teams alongside other IT DevOps staff.
Continuously work with stakeholders to enhance and evolve the IAM program.
Prepare documentation for audits and act as POC for audit issues.
